answers.answer: He probably will have growth spurts then measure exactly on schedule don't sweat it cuz doctors can be off my baby goes back n forth from measuring a week ahead to right on track
Don't worry to much, the average is 8-9 lbs

question: so I went to the hospital and had an ultrasound done. the nurse said my sons 2 pounds 10 ounces... I know it can be off a bit.... but this app says he should roughly be 2 pounds... I'm 27 weeks 5 days...I dont have gestational diabetes... hes just growing...but I'm scared I'll have a 10 pound baby:/ not that it would matter,  but delivery and such... anyone growing a big baby?
title: ugh nervous and scared
